article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of California
article.summary: Learn more about U.S. Export Assistance Centers of California.
article.content:
With offices throughoutCalifornia, the U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized California companies develop international markets.

  • Northern California Offices
  • Southern & Central California Offices

Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  1. Identify and evaluate international partners
  2. Navigate international documentation chall​enges
  3. Create market entry strategies
  4. With other export related guidance.​

​
article.seometadatatitle: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of California
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about U.S. Export Assistance Centers of California.
